description: Explore how blockchain technology is revolutionizing patent management by enhancing efficiency, transparency, and security. This article covers current challenges in patent management, blockchain's role in overcoming these challenges, case studies, and future prospects.
keywords: Blockchain, Patent Management, Intellectual Property, Digital Age, Transparency, Efficiency, Security, Smart Contracts, Global Harmonization
title: Blockchain and Patent Management: Transforming Intellectual Property in the Digital Age
